duties_responsibilities.duty: Build and maintain a book of residual income through business to business sales.
Identify and prioritize sales opportunities, and manage multiple touch points simultaneously.
Conduct face-to-face meetings, network, and build a portfolio of clients in the field.
Engage in critical business discussions to solve business owners' problems related to promoting and selling products or services.
Maintain client relationships for future revenue growth and customer retention.
Effectively communicate and bring concepts to life to drive sales and lead the team.
Participate in training for publishing and utilize the provided support.
Meet high-performance standards and take control of the territory to achieve business goals.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Sales, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
